text:
Starting next Tuesday (March 9), the @SNHDinfo and #ClarkCounty to extend hours at #COVID19 #Vaccine locations.

▪️Cashman Ctr. - appointments until 6pm.
▪️Las #Vegas Convention Ctr. - appointments until 5:30pm.
▪️Health District (280 S. Decatur) - appointments begin at 7am. https://t.co/sa4orkjaQY
